Detailed Description

Do not use getAnswer.

Use getMatches and getOverviewMatch. If getMatches.size() returns > 0 - dont bother with the overview matches.

Definition at line 46 of file SearchRequest.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SearchRequest::SearchRequest (  const RequestData &  parentOrID,
const SearchRequestParameters &  params,
const MC2Coordinate &  position,
const MC2String &  itemQuery,
const TopRegionRequest *  topReq,
int  radiusMeters = 1000,
const SearchRequestParameters *  overParams = NULL
) 
 

Creates a new SearchRequest with the coordinate used instead of OverviewMatches.

All municipals inside the radius will be searched. If distance sort or confidence sort is requested, the position will be used for that too.

Parameters:
reqID The request id.
params The search parameters.
position The center of the circle.
itemQuery String to search for.
topReq Pointer to TopRegionRequest, witch current/valid data
radiusMeters Municipals inside this radius will be considered.
overParams The overview search parameters, default params.

SearchRequest::SearchRequest (  const RequestData &  parentOrID,
const SearchRequestParameters &  params,
const MC2String &  itemQuery,
const MC2BoundingBox &  bbox,
const TopRegionRequest *  topReq,
const SearchRequestParameters *  overParams = NULL
) 
 

Creates a new SearchRequest with a boundingbox used instead of OverviewMatches.

All municipals inside the boundingbox will be searched. If distance sort or confidence sort is requested, the center will be used for that.

Parameters:
reqID The request id.
params The search parameters.
itemQuery String to search for.
bbox Municipals inside this will be considered.
topReq Pointer to TopRegionRequest, witch current/valid data
overParams The overview search parameters, default params.

SearchRequest::SearchRequest (  const RequestData &  parentOrID,
const SearchRequestParameters &  params,
const IDPair_t &  origin,
const MC2String &  itemQuery,
const TopRegionRequest *  topReq,
int  radiusMeters = -1,
const SearchRequestParameters *  overParams = NULL
) 
 

Will search inside the municipals around the supplied itemID.

Right now it will be implemented the same way as searching using a coordinate and a radius. All municipals inside the radius will be searched. If distance sort or confidence sort is requested, the position will be used for that too.

Parameters:
reqID The request id.
params The search parameters.
origin The center of the circle.
itemQuery String to search for.
topReq Pointer to TopRegionRequest, witch current/valid data
radiusMeters Municipals inside this radius will be considered. -1 will mean that MapModule will decide. (When implemented).
overParams The overview search parameters, default params.

SearchRequest::SearchRequest (  const RequestData &  parentOrID,
const SearchRequestParameters &  params,
const vector< IDPair_t > &  selectedAreas,
const char *  itemQuery,
const TopRegionRequest *  topReq,
const MC2Coordinate &  sortOrigin = MC2Coordinate::invalidCoordinate,
const SearchRequestParameters *  overParams = NULL,
int32  radiusMeters = -1
) 
 

Will search inside the supplied areas.

Parameters:
reqID Request ID.
params The search parameters.
selectedAreas Vector of itemids of the overview matches. Should not be empty.
itemQuery String to search for.
topReq Pointer to TopRegionRequest, witch current/valid data
sortOrigin Origin to sort from.
overParams The overview search parameters, default params.
radiusMeters The cutoff point for matches in meters.

SearchRequest::SearchRequest (  const RequestData &  parentOrID,
const SearchRequestParameters &  params,
uint32  topRegionID,
const char *  areaQuery,
const char *  itemQuery,
const TopRegionRequest *  topReq,
const MC2Coordinate &  sortOrigin = MC2Coordinate::invalidCoordinate,
const SearchRequestParameters *  overParams = NULL
) 
 

Will search to overview search and possibly underview search.

Parameters:
reqID Request ID.
params The search parameters.
topRegionID ID of top region to search in.
areaQuery String to search for on overview.
itemQuery String to search for on underview.
topReq Pointer to TopRegionRequest, witch current/valid data
sortOrigin Origin to sort from.
overParams The overview search parameters, default params.

SearchRequest::SearchRequest (  const RequestData &  parentOrID,
const SearchRequestParameters &  params,
const vector< uint32 > &  mapIDs,
const char *  itemQuery,
const TopRegionRequest *  topReq,
const MC2Coordinate &  sortOrigin = MC2Coordinate::invalidCoordinate,
const SearchRequestParameters *  overParams = NULL
) 
 

Search the supplied map.

Should not be used very often. Could maybe be used as a subrequest later.

Parameters:
reqID Request ID.
params The search parameters.
mapIDs The map ids.
itemQuery String to search for on underview.
topReq Pointer to TopRegionRequest, witch current/valid data
overParams The overview search parameters, default params.

SearchRequest::SearchRequest (  const RequestData &  parentOrID,
OldSearchRequestPacket *  p,
const TopRegionRequest *  topReq,
bool  uniqueOrFull = true,
bool  searchOnlyIfUniqueOrFull = false,
uint32  regionsInMatches = 0,
uint32  overviewRegionsInMatches = 0,
bool  lookupCoordinates = false,
bool  lookupBBoxes = false,
const MC2Coordinate &  sortOrigin = MC2Coordinate::invalidCoordinate
) 
 

Create SearchRequestPackets containing one mapID each from a SearchRequestPacket containing 0 or more mapIDs.

This constructor is deprecated.

Parameters:
reqID is the unique request ID for this request
p The packet to be expanded, the regionsInMatches in p is ignored use regionsInMatches and overviewRegionsInMatches.
topReq Pointer to TopRegionRequest, witch current/valid data
uniqueOrFull if locations must be unique of full match to match.
searchOnlyIfUniqueOrFull send search only if location is uniqueOrFull.
regionsInMatches The type of regions to return in searchmatches.
overviewRegionsInMatches The type of regions to return in overviewmatches.
lookupCoordinates True if coordinates should be included in the matches. Coordinates can only be returned if getMatches is used, not in getAnswer.
lookupBBoxes True if MC2BoundingBoxes should be looked up. Sets lookupCoordinates to true if true.
sortOrigin Must be set if distance sort should be used.

PacketContainer* SearchRequest::getAnswer (   )  [virtual]
 

Return a PacketContainer with a VanillaSomethingPacket.

Does not return matches with coordinates or bboxes or matches sorted by distance, so do not use it.

Reimplemented from Request.

void SearchRequest::handleDoneOK (   )  [private]
 

Handles the case when the request has no more packets to send.

In the future it will update the location names and sort the matches. No packets will be sent here.

const char *  areaQuery,
uint32  searchRegion,
const char *  itemQuery,
const MC2Coordinate &  sortOrigin,
const SearchRequestParameters *  overParams
)  [private]
 

Initializes the SearchHandler using a packet.

*

Parameters:
reqID The request id.
params The search parameters.
nbrSelectedAreas The number of selected areas, may be 0.
selectedAreaMapIDs The mapIDs for the selected areas.
selectedAreaItemIDs The itemIDs for the selected areas.
areaQuery String to use when searching for areas, not used when nbr selected areas is greater than 0.
searchRegion The region(country) to search in when using areaQuery.
itemQuery String to use when searching for items.
sortOrigin Must be set if distance sort should be used.
overParams The overview search parameters, default params.
